body:
We get lots of these:


rtrace: warning - non-planar vertex for polygon "lyr_15_pol_158568312"


When using Radiance on models that we have generated using our Lightwave 
exporter.


These polys should all be "flat", but the exporter only has information 
down to 4 decimal points.


How flat does Radiance require polys to be before giving a warning?


Chris
